content: Credit Card Asked by Khor Wei TingAsked on 25 May 2019What is the maximum cashback for OCBC Plus! Visa Credit Card?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Aik KaiLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 25 May 2019OCBC Plus! Visa is not a cashback card, hence there is no cap, or "maximum" cash back. You earn rebates in the form of cash rebates and LinkPoints by shopping at NTUC. Note that there is a minumum spend of $500 in places outside NTUC before the full range of rebates and LinkPoints can be unlocked.0 comments0
